name: ByteLike
description:
ByteLike is a turn-based roguelike like Angband, Powder or Pixel Dungeon!
Dive into the depth, fight off tough enemies and find precious loot in this randomly generated infinite dungeon!

Your past deaths can both help or make your next adventure a lot tougher!
Every time you die, you leave a shadow of your past self behind. Defeat your shadow to regain your loot!

In-game leaderboard!
Compare your scores with other ByteLike players. Top players will even be showed on the game's website!

For more info or guides feel free to visit the game's website!
https://bytelike.org
